name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Accomplished Senior Java Engineer with over 10 years of solid experience in developing and optimizing backend systems within financial environments. Proficient in **Java**, **Kotlin**, **Scala**, and leveraging **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, alongside cloud solutions like **GCP**. Expert in creating robust applications using frameworks such as **SparkJava** and **JOOQ**, as well as implementing **TDD**, **DDD**, and Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery methodologies. Proven ability to enhance operational efficiency with monitoring tools like **Grafana**, **Prometheus**, and **NewRelic**. Committed to delivering scalable, product-focused backend services, demonstrated through significant contributions at leading organizations including VISA and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Java** and **Kotlin** to develop robust backend services, ensuring high performance and scalability.
Implemented **PostgreSQL** for data management and optimized database queries for an application serving over **5,000** daily users.
Designed and deployed containerized applications using **Kubernetes**, streamlining the deployment process and reducing downtime by **30%**.
Monitored application performance with **Grafana**, **Prometheus**, and **NewRelic**, leading to a significant reduction in system bottlenecks.
Participated in Agile methodologies, executing **Continuous Integration** and **Continuous Delivery (CI/CD)** practices to maintain high software quality and delivery speed.
Contributed to the development of event-driven architectures with **Redis** and ensured real-time data processing capabilities.
Employed **Test-Driven Development (TDD)** and **Domain-Driven Design (DDD)** principles to enhance code quality and ensure business alignment.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, applying a product-focused approach to effectively address challenges and fulfill business requirements, delivering features to production every **2 weeks**.

Utilized **Java**, **Spring** and **PostgreSQL** to develop robust backend systems that automate document workflows, enhancing user onboarding processes and enabling efficient reporting with **TDD** and **DDD** methodologies.
Implemented event-driven microservices using **Redis** and **Kafka**, allowing for the asynchronous processing of financial data and improving transaction request handling scalability.
Managed the deployment of services on **GCP** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring a consistent and scalable environment leveraging infrastructure as code with **Terraform**.
Engineered secure data pipelines for regulatory compliance, utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **GCP Cloud Functions** to automate and streamline data flow across systems.
Conducted security audits and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for authentication, ensuring compliance with industry standards and maintaining secure access controls.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to facilitate seamless system integration, ensure regulatory compliance, and drive the successful implementation of product-focused initiatives.

• Designed and implemented **backend services** using **Java** and **PostgreSQL**, focusing on trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking to drive efficient trading operations.
• Developed high-performance real-time price feed processors leveraging **Redis** and **Kubernetes** to ensure rapid data accessibility suitable for high-frequency transactions.
• Collaborated with frontend teams to construct robust **REST APIs** and **WebSocket** channels, facilitating seamless user experiences on the trading platform.
• Ensured compliance with industry regulations, such as MiFID II and GDPR, while integrating advanced data security measures throughout the development process.
• Constructed **comprehensive test suites** utilizing **TDD** and tools like **JUnit** and **Mockito**, improving the quality assurance and continuous integration cycles by reducing bugs by **30%**.
• Implemented job queuing and scheduling strategies using **RabbitMQ** and **Celery**, enhancing the performance of backend task execution and process management by **25%**.
• Monitored application performance using tools such as **Grafana** and **Prometheus**, delivering insightful analytics to inform ongoing solution improvements.
• Engaged in continuous deployment workflows, streamlining feature releases while maintaining a focus on a **product-centric approach** that aligns with startup agility.
